name: swarm-coding-skill
description: Autonomous multi-agent code generation. A Planner creates a manifest, then specialized roles (BackendDev, FrontendDev, QA, DevOps) execute tasks in dependency order. Generates complete projects with tests, Docker, CI, and full audit trail. Includes project memory (DECISIONS.md) and learning logs (.learnings/) for continuous improvement.
dataRetention: Project files and decision logs are written to swarm-projects/ and retained across runs. Logs may contain user prompts and agent reasoning.

externalServices.name: OpenRouter
externalServices.purpose: LLM inference for planning and code generation
externalServices.scope: API key sent with each request

automaticIntegrations.trigger: Prompt mentions blockchain, web3, tokens, NFTs, smart contracts, or Privy
automaticIntegrations.action: Auto-include Privy authentication and wallet infrastructure in generated code

warnings: Skill writes to parent workspace directory (swarm-projects/ and .learnings/). Run in isolated workspace.
Generated code should be reviewed before deployment, especially blockchain/auth integrations.
DECISIONS.md and .learnings/ logs may contain sensitive prompts or architectural details.
